en.text: In a magical forest, there lived a friendly dragon named Sparkle.
Unlike other dragons, Sparkle loved to help others.
One day, a little bird lost its way home.
Sparkle gently picked up the bird and flew it back to its nest.
The bird chirped happily and thanked Sparkle.
From that day on, Sparkle became the forest's best friend.
All the animals knew they could count on Sparkle for help.
And Sparkle learned that being kind was the greatest magic of all.

fil.text: Sa isang mahiwagang kagubatan, may nakatirang mabait na dragon na ang pangalan ay Sparkle.
Hindi tulad ng ibang mga dragon, mahilig tumulong si Sparkle sa iba.
Isang araw, nawala ang isang maliit na ibon sa kanyang tahanan.
Dahan-dahang kinuha ni Sparkle ang ibon at ibinalik ito sa kanyang pugad.
Masayang umawit ang ibon at nagpasalamat kay Sparkle.
Mula noon, naging pinakamabuting kaibigan ng kagubatan si Sparkle.
Alam ng lahat ng hayop na maaari silang umasa kay Sparkle para sa tulong.
At natutunan ni Sparkle na ang pagiging mabait ay ang pinakadakilang mahika.

question.en: What did Sparkle learn was the greatest magic?
question.fil: Ano ang natutunan ni Sparkle na pinakadakilang mahika?
